snippet: In an unusually outspoken interview, Mayor Bill de Blasio said Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, a fellow Democrat, had been acting out of pettiness and a desire for revenge.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, in striking interview, denounces Gov Andrew M Cuomo for restricting and opposing city's goals because of vengeful pettiness; observers say de Blasio is attempting to outmaneuver Cuomo, who holds great power over his administration's operations, even though mayor needs governor as negotiating partner.
lead_paragraph: In an unusually outspoken interview, Mayor Bill de Blasio said Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, a fellow Democrat, had been acting out of pettiness and a desire for revenge.

headline.main: Patience Spent, de Blasio Accuses Cuomo of Hurting New York City Out of ‘Revenge’
headline.print_headline: Mayor Rebukes Cuomo, as Feud Spills Into Open
